synopsis.text: Persia and Inuzuka, leaders of rival dormitories at the esteemed Grigio Academy, harbor a clandestine love for each other amidst a backdrop of longstanding conflict between their respective nations. As leaders of the 'Black Doggies' and 'White Cats' dorms, representing the Eastern Nation of Touwa and the Principality of West, they must conceal their affection to prevent chaos from erupting among their peers. In their pursuit of peace and a chance to experience love, the two star-crossed lovers navigate the tumultuous waters of high school rivalries, secret rendezvous, and the ever-looming threat of their relationship being exposed. Will their love triumph against all odds, or will it crumble under the weight of their nations' feud?
